Services

Our services are designed to help you through every step of the college selection process from a financial perspective. Our model helps you determine what you can afford for college and then seeks to maximize your resources by finding the best college for your situation. With our many years of experience, we help can you avoid falling into the ever growing statistics of unsustainable college debt.



At Your Service



Affordability Assessment



We work with clients to truly understand what they can afford to pay for college. You will see what the government and colleges feel you can afford, but that determination is based on old logic. Let us work with you to create a budget that will allow your family to still reach your financial and educational goals.

College List Assistance



Let us help you build a list of schools that you can afford without getting in crippling debt. All schools have a different price and varying financial aid models. Let us work with you to cut to the chase and use our experience to help you create a financially stable list of colleges that won’t break the bank.

Application Assistance



Whether you have question about the FAFSA or the CSS Profile, we make it stress free. You will have a lot of paperwork to complete and you may have questions. We will work with you to make sure that you complete the paperwork correctly to avoid costly mistakes.

Personalized Meetings



One on One meetings designed for you and your family's situation. Our meeting are all about you. We want to provide you with information that will help you and is tailored to your situation. We can answers all your questions and guide you in the right direction.
